creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: long white huipil with multicolored embroidery; embroidered decorations include bird motifs as well as geometric patterns; neck opening is circular with a vertical slit in front; sleeves consist of slits cut at sides; huipil constructed of three panels; majority of embroidery located in center panel
title: Ceremonial sobra huipil
